Sentencas: The GdBaCo2O5+x oxide has been presented as a promising cathode material for solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Simulations of REBaCo2O5.5 (RE=Gd, La, Y) cathode materials through energy minimisation and molecular dynamics

Sentencas: It presents very high oxygen exchange and diffusion coefficients, two characteristics of utmost importance for an efficient cathode material.
Titulo: Simulations of REBaCo2O5.5 (RE=Gd, La, Y) cathode materials through energy minimisation and molecular dynamics

Sentencas: Yet the understanding at atomic scale of these two properties is rather limited.
Titulo: Simulations of REBaCo2O5.5 (RE=Gd, La, Y) cathode materials through energy minimisation and molecular dynamics

Sentencas: Here, we performed calculations to understand the influence of rare-earth nature in REBaCo2O5.5 (RE=Gd, La, Y) on material stability and oxygen diffusion properties.
Titulo: Simulations of REBaCo2O5.5 (RE=Gd, La, Y) cathode materials through energy minimisation and molecular dynamics

Sentencas: Through energy minimisation, we determined the most energetically favourable distribution of A-site cations and oxygen vacancies.
Titulo: Simulations of REBaCo2O5.5 (RE=Gd, La, Y) cathode materials through energy minimisation and molecular dynamics

Sentencas: We also investigated with Molecular Dynamics simulations the mechanisms of oxygen diffusion in A-site ordered REBaCo2O5.5.
Titulo: Simulations of REBaCo2O5.5 (RE=Gd, La, Y) cathode materials through energy minimisation and molecular dynamics

Sentencas: The results confirm that oxygen vacancies essentially lie in the RE-plane and that diffusion is mainly two-dimensional with oxygen moving in the (a,b) plane while diffusion along the c axis is strongly hindered.
Titulo: Simulations of REBaCo2O5.5 (RE=Gd, La, Y) cathode materials through energy minimisation and molecular dynamics

Sentencas: Between 1300 and 1900 K. the activation energy for oxygen diffusion lies in the range 0.69-0.83 eV depending on the RE cation nature, values in good agreement with the experimental ones.
Titulo: Simulations of REBaCo2O5.5 (RE=Gd, La, Y) cathode materials through energy minimisation and molecular dynamics

Sentencas: We show that, in the double perovskite structure, the replacement of Gd by a larger rare-earth ion enhances oxygen diffusion properties but also reduces the stability of the double perovskite structure.
Titulo: Simulations of REBaCo2O5.5 (RE=Gd, La, Y) cathode materials through energy minimisation and molecular dynamics
